channel.title: Reporting Engine Errors
channel.description:
I don't know how Helpful this will be. But this is the second time I got an Engine Error while playing. So I am going to report this one. [quote] Engine Error Can't load lump 53, allocation of 24703737 bytes failed!!! [/quote] I would suggest people report Engine Errors here so we are not flooding the forum.
Thank you for the great game Stormen

item.title: Reporting Engine Errors
item.dc:creator: joanet89
item.description:
k3nny1550:

I got the “Can’t Load Lump 53” error as well, on the level transition from the Surface Tension dam to the next sequence after travelling through the dam. I’ve actually never gotten this error before on any other source game =P

But yeah, I’ll just load the map again and see if it works now.

I have had the same error right now in the same place and also its the first time I get this error in a source game.

Read full topic

No .mdmp file was created.
